location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'ROUTES in PERSIA VOL. IV INDEX MAP'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in colour on paperDimensions: 480 x 500mm, on sheet 552 x 610mm

mods.abstract: The map is a General Staff India publication marked for official use only, and accompanies Routes in Persia. Volume IV, Part I.The map shows a region of southern and eastern Persia, indicating routes described in the volume, cities, towns, roads, tracks, paths and hydrology. Numbers and letters identify the corresponding Survey of India sheets.The map was heliozincographed at the Survey of India Offices, Calcutta, and was prepared by the Simla Drawing Office; it includes a printing statement which reads 'S.D.O. No. 2396, September 1918.'.

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
